actions.name: Innards Out

cost.trigger: The user is @Affliction[fainted] by an attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is @Affliction[fainted] by an attack.
Effect: The user retaliates against the triggering creature in range, dealing the damage they took before fainitng to the triggering creature's HP.
